DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine repetitive computerized cognitive training improve work memory patient sick leave due complex symptom disorder ( chronic pain , chronic fatigue , anxiety , depression sleep disorder ) , whether effect cognitive control training transfer task .
DOC.brief_title: Subjective Memory Complaints , Objective Memory Performance Cognitive Training
DOC.criteria: sick leave due complex symptom disorder : chronic pain , chronic fatigue , anxiety , depression and/or sleep disorder sick leave least eight week . severe mental disorder acute psychosis ongoing manic episode suicidal ideation ongoing abuse alcohol substance . able communicate Norwegian
